title: Test /aura.act end-to-end
description: Full pipeline test. Run /aura.act with audio - should transcribe, generate title, create .aura/output/ directory with README.md, and move audio.

title: Review README.md Future Work section
description: Check README.md for feature roadmap and Future Work section. When ready to add features, create specs/ directory and use /aura.epic or /aura.feature to plan.

title: Read CLAUDE.md for project context
description: Start here. CLAUDE.md explains aura's architecture, dogfooding workflow, and how to add commands/scripts.

title: Phase 2: Beads Integration
description: Ensure Beads is properly required and initialized. Spec: specs/epic-aura-cleanup/feature-beads-integration.md

title: Phase 4: Tron Verification Test
description: Create end-to-end verification with documented instructions. Spec: specs/epic-aura-cleanup/chore-tron-verification.md

title: Phase 3: Slash Command Coherence
description: Complete all 12 slash commands with full workflows. Spec: specs/epic-aura-cleanup/feature-slash-commands.md

title: Run aura init in tests/tron
description: Verify distribution works. Run 'uv run aura init' in tests/tron/ to confirm templates copy correctly to target repos.

title: Phase 5: Agent Installation Test
description: Agent follows README instructions from clean state, proves they work. Spec: specs/epic-aura-cleanup/chore-agent-installation-test.md

title: Phase 1: Installation Cleanup
description: Standardize on single installation method, remove dead documentation. Spec: specs/epic-aura-cleanup/chore-installation-cleanup.md

title: Phase 0: Clean Slate Test
description: Reset environment completely, document current installation state. Spec: specs/epic-aura-cleanup/chore-clean-slate-test.md

title: Test /aura.transcribe with audio file
description: Verify dogfooding works. Run /aura.transcribe with a test audio file to confirm scripts at .aura/scripts/ are functional. Requires OPENAI_API_KEY in .env.

title: Update README with proper uv virtual environment setup instructions
